product_name: Cycle Dog Green MAX Reflective Dog Leash
long_description: The Cycle Dog Green MAX reflective dog leash uses old bike tubes to create a tough and stylish leash to lead your furry friend while saving materials from going to the landfill. Flexible and non-absorbent tube material dries quickly and resists fraying. Reflective nylon overlay offers enhanced visibility in low light. The Cycle Dog Green MAX reflective dog leash features a handy accessory loop that doubles as a bottle opener.
short_description: The Cycle Dog Green MAX reflective dog leash uses old bike tubes to create a tough and stylish leash to lead your furry friend while saving materials from going to the landfill.
